meanings.definition: Not relating to or caused by microorganisms.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a nonmicrobial treatment for the skin infection.
meanings.sent2: The laboratory confirmed that the water sample was nonmicrobial.
meanings.sent3: The nonmicrobial hand sanitizer was so gentle, it felt like lotion.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmicrobial approach to gardening involved using only natural fertilizers.
meanings.sent5: The nonmicrobial environment of the space station ensured the safety of the astronauts.

meanings.definition: Not involving or produced by microscopic organisms.
meanings.sent1: The nonmicrobial cleaning solution was effective against germs.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the nonmicrobial components of the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The nonmicrobial yogurt tasted surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a nonmicrobial ray of sunshine in the room.
meanings.sent5: The nonmicrobial nature of the desert made it a unique habitat for certain plants.
